_header: Listeneth lordings lief and dear / Ye that will of the Sunday hear
Subjects: Paul, saint; legends, of the afterlife
_description: ‘þe visions of seynt poul’ — 346 lines in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Lustneþ lordynges leof and dereȜe þat wolen of
                    þe sonday here…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Bi wȝuche seruyse we may comeTo vre lord god and
                    wiþ him wone
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Þe visions of seynt Poul wan he was rapt in to paradys (f.
